author: James Crump, James Crump
title: Coronavirus: Scientists warned China was 'time bomb' for an outbreak
description: Report explains coronaviruses are well known to undergo genetic recombination
content:
Scientists warned that China was a time bomb for a virus like Covid-19 over a decade before the current pandemic emerged.
In a study titled, Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus as an Agent of Emerging and Reemerging Infection published in Clinical … [+2113 chars]
